Traits.Name: Greenwalker
Traits.Description: All hobs ignore difficult and dangerous terrain.

Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Traits.Name: Bargain
Traits.Description:
As an effect, the Geryan can strike one of the following bargains with any foe. The bargain interrupts anything that's currently going on, and resolves immediately. The terms of the bargain are hidden until they trigger. Accepting a bargain is voluntary, and the Geryan can only offer a bargain once a round.
- Luck: Trigger: The foe started their turn. Effect: The foe gains +1 boon on all attacks and saves this turn. Terms: The Geryan recharges all its abilities.
- Immortality: Trigger: Foe just took a wound. Effect: The character can ignore the wound. Terms: The Geryan grants vigor 2 to itself or an ally in range 6.
- Wealth: Trigger: The foe's turn started. Effect: Place a wealth token in a free space of the Geryan's choice in range 6. The wealth token is an intangible summon. It can be picked up if any character ends its turn adjacent with no other characters adjacent to the token, and is dropped in an adjacent space if a character is defeated. If a character ends combat with the wealth token, they gain 2 dust.
- Beauty: Trigger: The foe just took damage. Effect: The foe reduces all that damage to 1. Their skin and hair/fur become clean and look amazing. Terms: Every ally of the Geryan in range 3 of that foe gains hatred of them and they become branded and vulnerable.

Interrupts.Name: Wish
Interrupts.Trigger: An ally in range 6 is reduced to 0 hp.
Interrupts.Effect: That ally returns to 25% hp instead, then the the Geryan takes 25% of its max hp in damage, which could cause it to be defeated.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Actions.Name: Diaga
Actions.Description: An ally in range 4 can save, ending a mark, status, or blight on a successful save. If that ally is bloodied, they also gain vigor 1.

Actions.Name: Chastise
Actions.Effect: A character in range 6 takes 1 piercing damage. If that character attacks before the end of their next turn, they take [D] piercing damage and this effect ends.

Actions.Name: Misfortune
Actions.Description: A character in range 10 gains +1 curse on all attack rolls and saves until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Great Luck
Actions.Description: An ally in range 10 gains +1 boon on all attack rolls and saves until the end of their next turn.

Actions.Name: Ancient Reversa
Actions.Description: The Geryan gains aura 2 until the start of their next turn. While inside the aura, when any character (foe or ally) takes damage, roll a d6. On a 4+, that character is cured.
